title: LISTEN: The Debate podcast - Steve Parish and Steve McLaren
description: Listen back to the latest edition of The Debate, as Steve Parish and Steve McClaren joined Geoff Shreeves to discuss the big football talking points.
content: With video assistant referee (VAR) technology set to be trialled for the first time in Brighton and Crystal Palace's FA Cup clash on Monday evening, the panel weighed up the pros and cons of the advancement, as well as the increasing hostility surrounding diving in the game.Ross Barkley's Â£15m move from Everton to Chelsea was also debated, following the confirmation of the transfer on Friday evening.All that and more in the latest The Debate podcast.Listen to The Debate and subscribe to more podcasts via iTunes
